mokada api wagema wenath pasal walin lamayi enawa kiyala sar apita kiwwa.apita kanna kama inna kamara sama pahasukamakma denawa kiyala kiwiwa.api wanekak katha kara gena juni palawenda ude atata withara api ape pasalen pitath wuna.apita nayakayan puhunu kirime madhyasthanayata enna kiyala thibune eda hawasa paha wenakota api godak welasanin giye ape pasale sita ambailipitiyata yana athara thuradi balanna godak dewal thibuna nisa.apiwa ekka gena giya mahesh sar saha manjali mis harima hodayi.

shri lankawehi methek pawathi janadhipathiwarana waladi mawisin jayagrahakaya wenuwen mage chandaya prakasha kale 88 saha 94 warsha waladi pamanaki.ma dayabara bharya thomo da me pilibandawa mata sinasenniya.
ithaliya kotasak yuropa mahadwipaye da, kotasak dakunu diga yuropaye ithaliyanu ardhadwipaye da, madhyadharani muhude 'sisiliya' saha 'sadiniyawa' yana wishalathama dupath dekehida wyapthawa thibe.

loka dhaneshwaraye wiparitha kontha්rathkaru je aar jayawardhanage sampurna nokala kontha්raththuwa eda ohuta wiruddha wu ohuge munuburan wana wathman palakayan wisin jathika- wama- bauddha wes muhunak palada karagena yanu labayi.

ee pilibandawa ehi paryeshakayan kiyanne me nawa kramayen kshudra indikatu thudu sahitha ‘pachchayak’ wani palastharayak yoda gena wadath aarakshithawa, wedana rahithawa anagathaye di ennath laba diya haki bawayi.
ewita nidahas mrudukanga bhawitha godak denek pelabenu athiyi mage adahasa.
batahira balawathun kalapayen thallu karamin aasiyawe japanaye nayakathwaya sthapitha kirimata thawath samaharunta awashya wiya.
api unwa enkarej karanna oone aniwa...mata duka rawiyage baghath buwata wechchade ada appa..
ee nisa nindata pera saumya sonduru dewal gana sithanna.
